c74object.name: o.deletefile
c74object.description: Java wrapper to delete files in a given directory. In this case a wrapper was used instead of a deployer mainly because deletefile.mxj only accepts boot style directories, and a conformpath object is needed.

method.name: filepath
method.description: Set file path plus file name. Example: "/Users/username/Desktop/mypatch.maxpat" will set the filepath to the mypatch.maxpat file in the Desktop folder.

method.name: delete
method.description: Delete file at specified filepath. If no filepath is provided o.deletefile will make nothing.

method.name: dump
method.description: Dump stored filepath to Max Window.

entry.name: symbol
entry.description:
"failed" : failed to delete file.
"done" : successfully deleted the file.
